column4: hi,i wanna install yum and got it with apt-get,but when i try use yum it doesnt work.. think missing (nonexisting) repositiries,anyone know how to fix or where i can find repositories thatll work with ubuntu 11.04 ?
im used to yum.. wanna have it
so it seems possible as i got it with apt-get so it should work
Yum is not supported in Ubuntu. Why do you want to use yum?
